channel.title: Adobe Adobe Illustrator Security Bulletins

item.title: APSB25-74: APSB25-74: Security update available for Adobe Illustrator
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates. More details in the security bulletin.
Products: Adobe Illustrator Severity: Important
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/illustrator/apsb25-74.html
item.author: Adobe Security Team
